amendment.description: Am amendment numbered three printed in Part B of House Report 109-14 to amend the exemption for maximum driving and on duty time for drivers of motor carriers transporting agricultural commodities or farm supplies at the time of planting or harvest for a 100 air mile radius to the distribution point of the source of the commodities, by increasing the air mile radius to 150.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Kuhl (NY) amendment was withdrawn.
